short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gorgeous photos you'll love, each and every tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GreetMe makes opening a new browser tab fun and friendly. It's the best way to view the most beautiful images from Unsplash in the category you choose.

✔ Greets you by name
✔ Displays a gorgeous photo from your chosen category
✔ Let's you pin your favorite picture so all tabs display it
✔ Holds your notes (monospace font included)
✔ Enables you to complete two goals each day
✔ Lets you fly (if you enable it)!

All of your settings and info are synced with your Google Chrome account, so you get the same, secure GreetMe experience wherever you're signed into Chrome. 

Here are some of our favorite search terms: epic landscape, sunset, football, lions, text, inspiration, neon, and pandas.

We hope you love it! If you do, and if you don't, drop us a line at hi@getgreet.me and let us know what's on your mind.

Latest release (Feb 2021): serif font!

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS
1. Click "Add to Chrome" in the upper right hand corner.
2. Accept permission requirements (see our Note below).
3. Open a new tab and enjoy! (You may have to click the puzzle piece next to the URL bar, and click on GreetMe to activate the extension)
-----

Note: When you click "Add to Chrome," you'll be notified that this extension can
- Replace the page you see when opening a new tab
- Read your browsing history

Rest assured, we DO NOT and WILL NOT ever read your browsing history. We DO NOT store it, WILL NOT sell it, and we WILL NEVER do so. That is strictly against our policy and what we stand for.
